Detailed Description

Default namespace for the pjson library.

The namespace which any class of the pjson library is a part of.

Typedef Documentation

typedef std::vector<Value*> Json::JsonArray

A representation of a JSON array; consecutive values.

typedef bool Json::JsonBool

A representation of a JSON boolean; true or false.

typedef double Json::JsonNumber

A representation of a JSON number.

typedef std::map<std::string, Value*> Json::JsonObject

A representation of a JSON object; key, value pairs.

typedef std::string Json::JsonString

A representation of a JSON string.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum Json::Types

The available JSON types.

Enumerator:

Object type

Array type

JVSTRING 

String type

JVBOOL 

Bool type (true, false)

JVNULL
